Package it.seba.juno.view.component

package it.seba.juno.view.component
Contains all swing custom components used by views in game.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.seba.juno.view
    Contains all views of the MVC pattern used in game.
    it.seba.juno.view.component.listener
     
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractTextLabel
    Abstract implementation for a text label.
    Badge
    Badge which player can earn playing and winning matches.
    BadgeLabel
    Badge component for views.
    BadgePlayed
    Identify a badge assigned to player for played matches.
    BadgeWon
    Identify a badge assigned to player for won matches.
    ChoseColorButton
    Button used to chose the new color for the discard pile.
    ChoseColorButton.ChoseButtonType
    The type of the button.
    ChoseColorPanel
    The panel that hosts buttons used to chose the new color for the discard pile.
    DealerLabel
    The label to indicate which player is the dealer in a match.
    DeckButton
    Button for deck, draw a card from deck.
    DeckPanel
    The panel used to show the deck of Uno cards in game.
    DeleteModal
    The modal dialog used to confirm a player deletion.
    DialogButton
    Button for modal dialog.
    DialogButton.DialogButtonType
    The type of the button.
    DiscardPileColorLabel
    The label to indicate the color of the discard pile.
    DiscardPileLabel
    The label that shows the card inside the discard pile panel.
    ListPlayers<E>
    The list of players in players view.
    ListPlayersItem
    Item for the list of players.
    MainLabel
    Label to title a view.
    MenuButton
    General button used in game views.
    NewPlayerModal
    The modal dialog used to insert a new player to the game.
    OptionsButtonToggle
    Option button for sound and screen, it can be selected or unselected, act like a switch.
    OptionsButtonToggle.OptionButtonType
    The type of the button.
    OptionsRadioPlayers
    Option button to select the number of players.
    OptionsRadioPlayers.OptionRadioType
    The type of the button.
    OrderOfPlayLabel
    The label that shows the order of play into the game.
    PlayerCardButton
    The button to represent cards for the human player, provide a way for the human player to interact with owned cards during a match.
    PlayerCardLabel
    The label to represent cards for the npc players.
    PlayerCardLabel.PlayerCardLabelType
    The type of the card, where the card will be drawn.
    PlayerLabel
    Label to title a sub section in a view.
    PlayerPanel
    The panel that hosts label or buttons used to show cards for the players.
    SaidUnoLabel
    The label that shows which player said Uno, implemented action listener.
    SectionLabel
    Label to title a section in a view.
    SubSectionLabel
    Label to title a sub section in a view.
    TextFieldNewPlayerModal
    The text file for new player modal dialog, the place where insert the new player name.
